results.t: TACTILE | definition in the Cambridge English Dictionary

results.p: 1. perceptible by touch : tangible 2. of, relating to, or being the sense of touch tactilely ˈtak-tə-lē -ˌtī(-ə)l-lē adverb
Tactile has to do with the sense of touch. There's a huge tactile difference between smooth glass and rough sandpaper.

results.t: TACTILE | definition in the Cambridge English Dictionary
results.p: If something is tactile, it has a surface that is pleasant or attractive to touch: Her paintings have a very tactile quality.
